message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As we're just starting our conversation, I'd like to make a fair and competitive offer to get us started. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1200000. This is a great price, considering the product's worth $1500000 to you. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts!

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $1050000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price, considering the product's worth $1500000 to you.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that the product's value is worth more than $1050000 to you. Considering your willingness to meet me halfway, I'm willing to make a counteroffer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1100000. This is a compromise that still reflects the product's value to you, while also being more competitive than my initial offer. I hope this is something we can work with.
